StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Experienced senior program, portfolio executive, and business optimizer with demonstrated domestic and international expertise in strategic design and leadership of PMO Operations and Processes, SLA's KPI's, Executive Dashboards. Skilled at strategically developing and implementing short and long range business plans for Technology Enterprise Business Process Optimization. Led operational budgets of up to $7.5M and $200MM project portfolios. Directed Technology Enterprise Solutions spanning Global Markets & Diverse Industries, including: Federal Government, Financial Services, Power-Energy, Pharmaceutical, Telecommunications, Education and Insurance. Senior level PM specializing predictive analytics, Dodd/Frank, AML, Governance, MS Project Server, Planview, Agile SDLC, Mercury ITG /Clarity, Six Sigma, and ETQ.

PositionHistory.Title: Sr. Program Portfolio Manager, IT Corporate Project Management Office
PositionHistory.Description:
Merck Sr. Program Portfolio Manager, IT Corporate Project Management Office Oversee Supply Chain Management enhancement utilizing a business analytics tool FusionOps to integrate SAP, and Salesforce.com data to supply real time executive decision making capability to leadership via Dashboards and dynamic pipeline reports.
Lead 5 Sr. Managers in support of corporate portfolio management and solutions estimation. Responsible for working with Treasury and Corporate Finance in the planning of 2015 budget cycle. This includes working with the business to identify run the business / change the business initiatives. Additionally, responsible for Governance solution estimation of all projects comprising the portfolio. Merck portfolio of initiatives is $100MM.

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Emanuel A. Quiles is a resident of Westfield, NJ, US. He has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 32 years. Currently he is employed as a Sr. Program Portfolio Manager, IT Corporate Project Management Office at Diversant Solutions. Emanuel has extensive knowledge of Service Oriented Architecture, Microsoft Project Server, SAP, Six Sigma, SAP IS R, Mercury ITG, Data Mining, Cognos Impromptu, Clarity, Capability Maturity Model. Emanuel has an extensive management experience (30.1 years) with exposure to senior management positions.
ExperienceSummary.ManagementRecord: Since 2011-11 for 14 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Senior Program Manager, Corporate Project Management Office/Manager Project Management Office at KNOWLEDGENT GROUP INC.. Since 2008 for 36 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a Associate Vice President, Corporate Project/Manager Project Management Office at EDUCATIONAL TESTING SERVICES. Since 2006 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Sr. Director, Enterprise Governance/Manager Project Management Office at COMCAST CABLE CO.. Since 2004 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a senior management level working as a Vice President/Manager Project Management Office at POPULAR FINANCIAL HOLDINGS. Since 2002 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a executive/middle management level working as a Director, Quality Control-Project Governance/Manager Project Management Office at OMNICARE CLINICAL RESEARCH. Since 1998 for 36 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Sr. Investment Banking Associate/Manager Project Management Office at GOLDMAN SACHS. Since 1996 for 24 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a IT Manager/Manager Project Management Office. Since 1981 for 180 months the candidate had experience at a lower grade management level working as a Sr. Project Manager/Manager Project Management Office at BELL LABORATORIES.
